Pre-Game Insights: Guyana were promoted from League B to A in the previous edition after topping Group B of League B with 15 points.
Suriname maintained their division in 2023-24 after finishing third in Group B of League A.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guyana have won their last five matches at home in all competitions.
Suriname have won once and lost four times in their last five matches on the road.
Others: The top two finishers in Group A will advance to the quarterfinals while the fourth and fifth-placed teams will qualify for the Gold Cup preliminaries. The bottom two sides will be relegated to League B.
